text:
Requesting an enhancement to the ANT mail task to take id/pass values for
servers requiring authentication.  Also requesting the functional code to use
these values with a SMTP server requiring authentication.
creator: hanasaki@hanaden.com
stevel@apache.org
text:
Axis sends mail in two ways. Through its own code, and using the mime support in
mail.jar when attachments are added. 

I dont know if Sun's code supports auth -if it doesnt, you are out of luck. If
it does, then feel free to add
 -the code to <mail> to set the username and passwd attributes
 -the extensions to the build in mail class to support it
 -the bridge to the sun implementation to pass them down
I'm sure this contribution would be appreciated by many.

steve
